name: Detective Vera and the Mysterious Manor (Demo)
name_original: Detective Vera and the Mysterious Manor (Demo)
description:
Strange stuff have been happening recently... rumors of ghosts and ghouls making detectives delusional... and at the center of it all is a mansion by the name of Malbourne Manor. 

File-jockey-turned-detective Vera Greene is put on the case, but will she be able to figure out what's behind the rumors and solve the mystery, or will it be too much for this newbie detective?

Only time will tell.  

Current build version: 0.1.0

Note from creator: This isn't the full version, and it's likely that many things will be improved in the future. 

Planned features:

- A survey for play testers to make suggestions/report bugs

- Improvements on the dialogue system

- More items and item types

- "Notes" area for keeping valuable information

- Enemies and bosses

- Bigger world to explore

- More characters to talk to and interact with

- Side quests

- Custom soundtracks

- Cutscenes
